title: Implement Smart Breakdown Assistant
description: Create scripts/breakdown-suggester.py to analyze historical breakdown patterns and suggest optimal strategies for breaking down high-difficulty tasks. Uses machine learning on past successful breakdowns.
notes: Functions: analyze_similar_tasks(), suggest_breakdown_strategy(), estimate_subtask_count(), validate_breakdown_quality(). Data-driven suggestions based on successful patterns. LLM makes final decisions but gets intelligent recommendations.
assumptions: Sufficient historical data for pattern analysis
Scikit-learn for clustering and pattern matching
decision_rationale: Smart breakdown suggestions improve task decomposition quality over time. Learning from successful patterns reduces breakdown errors.
